title: Advanced Installer Architect v11.8
description:
Advanced Installer Architect v11.8
January 28, 2015

Advanced Installer is a Windows Installer authoring tool which enables 
developers and system administrators to easily build reliable MSI 
packages.

Features:

* Advanced Installer makes MSI creation a snap
* Advanced Installer integrates in automated build tools
* Install and register the resources composing your application
* Search, download and install Prerequisites
* Organize your application in modules and components
* Secure and choose your packageÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s presentations
* Extend the installation process with Custom Actions
* Customize the installation User Interface

================
[INSTALL NOTES]
================
(Patch for 10.0.5 still working)

Step 1: Please use 7Zip/WinRAR/Universal Extractor to EXTRACT FILES.
Step 2: Install (advinst.msi) DO NOT START APP.
Step 3: Copy patch (advanced.installer.10.+-patch.exe) to 
        installation directory, right-click and choose "Run As Admin" 
        and execute.

Done!
